name: World of Galaxies
description:
The player find himself in an endless space surrounded by enemies who have just one task, to eliminate him. The goal is to survive and destroy as many enemy ships as possible. For each destroyed enemy ship, the player gets certain number of points. The player’s ship has limited number of laser shots, but in the space, packages can be found, that can replenish lasers, energy shields or repair the damaged ship.

Controls

  • W or Arrow Up - fly
  • AD or Left and Right Arrow - rotation
  • Space - shoot
  • ESC - pause (in game)

Made with the MonoGame framework.
